item.title: Npc gives slayer
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

npc handler, looks like this

public static boolean IsDropping = false; public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; { if (IsDropping == false) { IsDropping = true; int Play = GetNpcKiller(NPCID); int Maxi = server.itemHandler.DropItemCount; for (int i = 0; i <= Maxi; i++) { if (server.itemHandler.DroppedItemsID[i] > 0) { } else { int NPCID2 = NPCID+34; //System.out.println("Npc id =" +NPCID); if(npcs[NPCID] != null && server.playerHandler.players[Play] != null) { if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ppl.addSkillXP(1050, 18); }
